proverb_text: The least Boy always carries the greatest fiddle

references.author: Ray
references.text: All lay load upon those that are the least able to bear it. For they that are least able to bear, are least to resist the imposition of the burden.

references.author: Ful.
references.text: The least Boy carries the biggest Fiddle.

similar_proverbs.text: All lay load on a willing horse
Folk call on the horse that will carry always.
